name: ボンバーマンランド3
summary: Bomberman Land 3 is an action video game released in 2005 by Racjin. The game was released in Japan. However, with PlayStation 3's debut, the Japanese version was put on the North American store called Bomberman Land 3 (PS2 Classic).
